metadata.name: The Door #1
metadata.description:
You have a door right in front of you - open it, get inside it and look around. Your eyes will meet, and everything will stop for a minute. Now thereâ€™s only the door that watches, and getting watched: Trinity. You're both the watcher and the watched. And the door is the host, the mother's womb, the holy spirit, or the creating power. And also the endless loop of them all.

There's a key for each door. The key to this door (artwork) will be sent to the owner of the door via airdrop. "This is your door and you're holding its key."
